website_summaries.verdict: By far the cutest bag we reviewed. Comes with stylish accents in your choice of four colors.
pros: This adorable polka-dot bag includes a separate, solid-fabric zippered pouch where you can store your more private items
The strap is securely attached all the way around the bag, making it less likely to break
cons: The darling bow accent is not very well attached and is prone to falling off

customer_reviews.title: Waited for the UPS truck all day. I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited for the UPS truck all day. I couldn't wait to get this bag. It came on time and as advertised. I had to hang my little friend on it I got from Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: MZ. HOPE

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long before it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I work at the airport and am required to carry a clear bag. I bought this bag about a year ago and it worked great - lasted quite a long time given that I carried it several days a week. Super cute, so I ordered two more - one to carry immediately and another one to have when that one fell apart. I don't know what has happened in the manufacturing process since the first one, but the second came apart at the base pretty soon after I started carrying it and the third fell apart at the straps the first day I carried it. Leaving behind cute and trying a different brand ...
customer_reviews.author: MBC in Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Okay bag with cool design
customer_reviews.text: Its ok bag. Quality is good, but as it lokks in pics it looks white but in actual it is black. May be the background was white that’s why. Quality of outside bag is better then the inside one. Normal bag with one small pouch. I like the outside bag way better.
customer_reviews.author: tamanna

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bag
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this bag, which I got because the arena where my son's graduation was held requires clear bags. Unfortunately, the gold started coming off the handle within a few days of use, revealing the bright pink plastic underneath. It wouldn't have been so bad if the plastic was beige or something. So i=I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: BookMom

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute. The purse is bigger than I thought. The bag holds A LOT more items than I thought it would. Love this bag. It’s my new favorite beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Khalilah Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Great around water!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bags! Great for the pool or beach! It is waterproof as I sat it in a big puddle of water at the pool this weekend and nothing leaked in! Very cute and comfortable to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It is cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is really cute. I see myself carrying it around without worrying for getting wet and scratched. Just hoping it would last long and handle some more weight. It said I will be receiving tomorrow but it is already here today! I like the fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE this bag, but I want the other color can't justify having two of these. One of the dots had a hole in it. Like it was a factory defect. I took a picture, but it isn't very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Saiida M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This handbag is really nice ~ I get a lot of compliments. Perfect for retail employees. The write-up says it is waterproof. However, the zipper area is not totally closed ~ there is an open gap of approx 2" on either side of the zipper. This is necessary for the design of the handbag. It is not a problem for me. But if you require something totally waterproof, you would need to make a few adjustments. Certainly the material itself, being a sturdy plastic, is waterproof. It took me a long time to find a clear bag I really liked. This one was worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! Stylish, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Stylish totebag for work and travel. Plenty of space. It comes with a black bag insert but you can switch up the look by using different colors. I did snip the hanging parts off the bow but I absolutely love this bag. My new fav
customer_reviews.author: Latoria Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great. The plastic is pretty thick, but the bow and handlebars are not as sturdy as I had hoped. It does work great in certain situations as a beach bag or a picnic bag, but I would not want to carry this around for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I have the same one in pink and its very durable and beautiful and plenty of room I used as an overnight bag

customer_reviews.title: the pouch inside is pretty big fits alot of things as well

customer_reviews.title: Works great for work and I get a ton of compliments ...

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than the pic! I love it.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for work and its super cute. I get lots of compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and its super cute. I get lots of compliments on it. It smells really plastic-y when you first get it though. Had to let it air out for about 2 weeks and wash it with windex to try to get the smell out. After a few months of using it now I don't notice the smell.

customer_reviews.title: I showed this to a friend and she loved it, mentioned she'd be ordering the same one

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

product_meta.title: Clear Tote Bag Beach Tote Bag Women Work Bag Travel Bag Handbag Gym Sports Bag Waterproof
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :11.9 x 11.5 x 1.6 inches; 1.2 Pounds
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :July 7, 2016
 * ASIN :B01I2NX0AI

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #89,248 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #275 inLuggage 
    *  #99 inTravel Tote Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars265 ratings
feature_bullets: ❤ 【High Quality Durable Tote】 - Made of thick and water - resistant pvc vinyl, features flat bottom and top zipper closure. The handles are strong sewn in tight.This is clearly the hand bag you have been searching for. It is going to last a long time.

❤ 【Multi Functional】 - Perfect Clear Work Bags for workplaces that require clear bags. It is also a perfect Vacation Travel Bag & Sports Event Bag and will help you move through security faster. It can be also used where regulations require clear bags such as NFL football games, casinos, events, parks, and college stadiums.
❤ 【Perfect Size】 - Measures 15.7x11x4inch, Big enough to carry all your necessities, such as cell phone, camera, hat, water bottle, paperworks, lunches, cosmetics, snacks, and more.
❤ 【2 in 1 Organizer Bag】 - Use the clear larger bag to hold your daily supplies, while using the included zipper bag for more personal items. It is easy to organize your stuff.

❤ 【You will love it!】 - Cute bowknot and polka dots, fashionable and eternal classic. This bag goes with mostly outfit. If there is a slight plastic smell when you receive the new bag, please air it out and the smell would go.
